actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-299, by Mr. McGovern.
Waiving a requirement a clause 6(a) of Rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 105.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 633, H. Res. 614 is laid on the table.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendars and Committee Reports) to allow consideration of the following measures on the same day they are presented to the House: (1) H.R. 3222 (Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2008); and (2) a bill to amend the Foreign Intelligence Surveillance Act of 1978 to establish a procedure for authorizing certain electronic surveillance.

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
